name: Meadow Market
layout: Lane A: fence line + stalls; Lane B: open plaza; Lane C: creek + bridges; Pocket1: hay-bale courtyard; Pocket2: wagon loop
hazards: Rolling barrels (knockback), Beehive posts (bee cloud slow), Market lanterns (fire puddle)
physicsProfile: Water: shallow only; Props: high, low mass; Blocker density: low-medium; Projectile occlusion: medium

name: Treetop Glade
layout: Lane A: elevated boardwalk; Lane B: forest interior zig-zag; Lane C: streambed shallow→deep; Pocket1: mushroom circle; Pocket2: hollow log cul-de-sac
hazards: Falling pinecones (small stun), Spiderweb patches (sticky slow, burnable), Squirrel stampede (harmless shove)
physicsProfile: Water: mixed shallow/deep; Props: medium, logs can roll (heavy); Blocker density: high; Turning friction: higher in leaf piles

name: Crystal Caves
layout: Lane A: left corridor narrow; Lane B: center chamber; Lane C: right corridor with timed crystal gates; Pocket1: bounce crystal alcove; Pocket2: loop tunnel
hazards: Bounce crystals (reflect knockback/some projectiles), Cave drips (slippery 0.6s), Crystal burst (radial shards telegraph ring)
physicsProfile: Water: puddles only; Props: low static blockers; Blocker density: medium-high; Special: bounce surfaces

name: Bubble Bog
layout: Lane A: boardwalk chain; Lane B: open bog deep water lanes with islands; Lane C: mud berm path; Pocket1: lily-pad island (moving); Pocket2: cattail thicket
hazards: Bubble vents (displacement), Mud geyser (brief root), Leech swarm (drag tether slow)
physicsProfile: Water: deep common; Props: medium floating pads/driftwood; Blocker density: medium; Dash scaling reduced in deep water

name: Clockwork Carnival
layout: Lane A: conveyor lane; Lane B: central carousel rotating cover; Lane C: gate maze timed doors; Pocket1: ticket booth nook; Pocket2: bumper-car ring
hazards: Conveyors (force fields), Pop-up mallets (telegraphed smash), Confetti cannons (VFX limited via caps)
physicsProfile: Water: none; Props: high (bumper cars heavy); Blocker density: high dynamic; External forces high
